verbs.description: counterpreach (third-person singular simple present counterpreaches, present participle counterpreaching, simple past and past participle counterpreached)

examples: The laity utter theological platitudes, especially in the wake of mystery. How often do they say things like, "If anybody deserved to go to heaven, it was Bob"? We have no need to counterpreach in the hallway when we hear this;  […]
